MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:32pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Shieldbridge substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:45pm.   We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:21pm on 7th March 2021.
